title: Pascal’s Triangle (Simple)
code:
rows = 5
for i in range(rows):
    num = 1
    print(' ' * (rows - i), end='')
    for j in range(i + 1):
        print(num, end=' ')
        num = num * (i - j) // (j + 1)
    print()
